spells.name: Fireball
spells.description: Deal 8 damage disregarding defence to a target.

spells.name: Freeze
spells.description: Freeze a target until your next turn.

spells.name: Missile Spell
spells.description: Create 3 missiles that deal 1 damage each disregarding defence.

spells.name: Plant Armour
spells.description: A target gets +4 armour for 2 turns.

spells.name: Poison
spells.description: A target takes 2 damage disregarding defence each turn for 4 turns.

spells.name: Pyroblast
spells.description: Deal 18 damage disregarding defence to a target.
